name: Gulp
description: Build with a Node.js streaming, task-based build system
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: gulpFile
inputs.label: Gulp File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from repo root of the gulp file script file to run.

inputs.name: targets
inputs.label: Gulp Task(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional.  default task will get run if not specified. Space delimited list of tasks to run.  If not specified, the default task will run.

inputs.name: arguments
inputs.label: Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional arguments passed to gulp.  --gulpfile is not needed since already added via gulpFile input above.

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Current working directory when script is run.  Defaults to the folder where the script is located.
